Big tech faces higher rates under Labour to help high street shops
description: Labour will reveal plans to increase taxes on large technology companies in its election manifesto, i understands. The party has scrapped plans for a new levy on digital services which would have forced US-based firms to pay more tax in Britain.

title: Inside Labour’s plan for a storm of regulations at work
description: The proposed changes include introducing “day one” workers’ rights, ending zero-hour contracts, banning fire and rehire practices, bringing in a “right to switch off” for workers, increasing the minimum wage and beefing up laws that block companies from blacklisting union workers.
